item.title: K17 CTF Writeup
item.description: A Capture The Flag event by the UNSW Security Society. There are challenges in Web, Pwn, Misc, Crypto, Rev, and an additional Beginner category. The event is beginner-friendly, but with a wide range of challenge difficulties.
